comment: Drummond (DET) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Gasol's (CHI) drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Snell (CHI) makes contact with Ilyasova's (DET) body that affects his shot attempt.
Butler (CHI) sets the screen on Jackson (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Gibson (CHI) sets the screen on Caldwell-Pope (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court of a simultaneous touch prior to the ball going OOB was overturned. Detroit was awarded possession.
RHH shows that Snell (CHI) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with Jackson (DET) that does not affect his drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Gasol (CHI) and Ilyasova (DET) both have their hands on the ball as Ilyasova attempts the putback shot attempt. The two players make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.
Gibson (CHI) sets the screen on Jackson (DET) and gives him enough room to avoid the contact. He then reestablishes position and sets another legal screen.
Rose (CHI) runs into and makes body contact with Ilyasova (DET) that affects his ability to hand the ball off.
Ilyasova (DET) does not obtain a legal guarding position prior to the contact with Gasol (CHI).
LATR shows that Drummond (DET) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Butler's (CHI) driving shot attempt.
Gasol (CHi) makes incidental contact with Morris (DET) during rebounding.
Gibson (CHI) makes incidental contact with Morris (DET) that does not affect his RSBQ on the drive to the basket.
Gibson (CHI) sets the screen on Jackson (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Ilyasova (DET) jumps and lands prior to releasing the ball.
Drummond (DET) does not step OOB while in possession of the ball and officials did not go to replay review to confirm if the call was correct.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court that Drummond (DET) committed offensive basket interference was overturned.
Caldwell-Pope (DET) legally contests Rose's (CHI) shot attempt.
[Incidental or immaterial] Gibson (CHI) loses his balance and pulls Ilyasova (DET) to the ground.
Caldwell-Pope (DET) makes contact with Gasol's (CHI) arms and body that affects his shot attempt.
Rose (CHI) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Jackson (DET) in the backcourt.
Snell (CHI) makes body to body contact with Morris (DET) that affects his RSBQ and forces him to step OOB.
Rose (CHI) commits a take foul on Jackson (DET).
Jackson (DET) enters the lane prior to the ball touching the rim.
Caldwell-Pope (DET) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Butler's (CHI) drive.
Gasol (CHI) and Jackson (DET) make incidental contact with one another prior to the inbounds.
Rose (CHI) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Jackson's (DET) drive and shot attempt.
Ilyasova (DET) moves his pivot foot after catching the pass and prior to the contact.
Ilyasova (DET) obtains a legal guarding position, however Butler (CHI) does not go through the defender and the contact is considered incidental.
Ilyasova (DET) makes contact with Gasol's (CHI) body that affects his putback shot attempt.
Butler (CHI) makes contact with Drummond's (DET) arm and body that affects his shot attempt.
Morris (DET) maintains legal guarding position and Butler (CHI) does not go through his space.
Ilyasova (DET) obtains a legal guarding position prior to the contact with Rose (CHI) on this pass and crash play.
Drummond (DET) hops consecutively on the same foot upon ending his dribble.
Gasol (CHI) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact that does not affect Drummond's (DET) driving shot attempt.
Drummond (DET) maintains a legal guarding position, but Gasol (CHI) does not go through the space of the defender at the start of his drive. This contact is considered incidental.
Ilyasova (DET) legally contests Gasol's (CHI) shot attempt.
Jackson (DET) clamps Gibson's (CHI) arm, affecting his ability to retrieve the rebound.
Morris (DET) legally contests Butler's (CHI) jump shot attempt.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court that Caldwell-Pope's (DET) field goal was a 3 pointer was confirmed.
Morris (DET) maintains legal guarding position and cleanly blocks Butler's (CHI) shot attempt.
Drummond (DET) and Morris (DET) set the screen on Butler (CHI) and give him room to avoid the contact.
Caldwell-Pope (DET) grabs Snell (CHI) and affects his RSBQ on the drive.
LATR shows that Caldwell-Pope (DET) and Drummond (DET) maintain legal guarding position as they defend and block Rose's (CHI) driving layup attempt.
LATR shows that Caldwell-Pope (DET) and Gasol (CHI) briefly engage and separate away from the ball.
Gibson (CHI) and Morris (DET) briefly engage and separate as Gibson sets a screen.
Gibson (CHI) makes incidental contact with Ilyasova (DET) while knocking the ball OOB during rebounding.
LHH shows that Ilyasova (DET) cleanly strips the ball from Butler (CHI).
Gasol (CHI) maintains legal guarding position as he contests Drummond's (DET) hook shot attempt.
Butler (CHI) undercuts Ilyasova (DET), affecting his ability to retrieve the rebound.
Drummond (DET) kicks the ball on the play.
After Gasol (CHI) sets a legal screen, Jackson (DET) hooks Gasol's leg and affects his FOM.
Morris (DET) grabs and holds Butler's (CHI) jersey and affects his FOM away from the ball.
Ilyasova (DET) faces up and clamps Gibson (CHI), affecting his ability to retrieve the rebound.
Gasol (CHI) maintains legal guarding position on the play to the basket by Ilyasova (DET).
Rose (CHI) makes contact with Jackson's (DET) body that affects his shot attempt.
Rose (CHI) steps under Jackson (DET) and does not allow him to land after the jump shot attempt.
Morris (DET) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Butler's (CHI) driving shot attempt. Any contact on the play is considered incidental and does not affect the shot attempt.
Caldwell-Pope (DET) and Gasol (CHI) make incidental contact with one another away from the ball.
Rose (CHI) makes incidental contact with Jackson (DET) that does not affect his RSBQ at the start of the drive.
Morris (DET) does not obtain a legal guarding position and makes contact with Butler (CHI) that affects his RSBQ.
Drummond (DET) does not obtain a legal guarding position and makes body to body contact with Butler (CHI) that affects his shot attempt.
Tolliver (DET) extends his leg as he sets the screen on Rose (CHI) without giving him room to avoid the contact.
Gibson (CHI) legally contests Jackson's (DET) driving shot attempt. Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Mirotic (CHI) firms up as he sets the screen on Johnson (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Johnson (DET) grabs Mirotic's (CHI) jersey and affects his FOM away from the ball.
Tolliver (DET) firms up as he sets the screen on Rose (CHI) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Gasol (CHI) makes incidental contact with Jackson (DET) after the ball has been released that does not affect his shot attempt.
Anthony (DET) grabs Butler (CHI) by the shoulder affecting his ability to secure the rebound.
Butler (CHI) does not establish himself inbounds prior to making contact with the ball.
Gasol (CHI) commits a take foul on Jackson (DET).
Snell (CHI) commits a take foul on Caldwell-Pope (DET).
[Observable in enhanced video] Rose (CHI) does not step OOB while in possession of the ball.
Caldwell-Pope (DET) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Butler's (CHI) jump shot attempt. Any contact on the play is initiated by Butler.
Mirotic (CHI) commits a take foul on Jackson (DET).
Caldwell-Pope (DET) legally contests Butler's (CHI) jump shot attempt.
